### SMALL AREA ### (~5-6 km width)

netconvert --keep-edges.in-boundary "132163.13,76092.44 137705.06,77236.69 137841.69,76109.51 137687.99,72565.75 134161.30,72480.36 132709.64,72480.36 132077.74,75989.97 132163.13,76092.44" -s sumo.net.xml -o smaller_nets/area1.net.xml

### MEDIUM AREA ### (~10 km width)

netconvert --keep-edges.in-boundary "131464.22,77138.95 139529.32,77068.73 139950.63,73307.02 138365.70,71962.84 131283.65,72073.18 131464.22,77138.95" -s sumo.net.xml -o smaller_nets/area2.net.xml

### LARGE AREA ### (~13-14 km width)

netconvert --keep-edges.in-boundary "130368.23,79431.58 132812.20,79639.31 139587.84,80031.44 143536.50,79639.31 143262.92,75781.85 143135.25,74213.33 143180.84,71523.13 143188.14,69911.75 132123.70,70002.04 130368.23,79431.58" -s sumo.net.xml -o smaller_nets/area3.net.xml
